trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls used to track and manage related groups of controls.
trans-unit.target: Contém uma coleção de controles <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> usados para controlar e gerenciar grupos de controles relacionados.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> class is a read-only collection of controls, typically used by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controls to manage sets of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> classe é uma coleção somente leitura de controles, normalmente usado por <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controles para gerenciar conjuntos de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object to keep a list of all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls on a page, whereas a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> control uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object to track the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls that it contains.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controlar usa um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> objeto para manter uma lista de todas a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles em uma página, enquanto um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> controlar usa um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> objeto para controlar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles que ele contém.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> collection contains both <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and other server controls (such as user controls, custom controls, and ASP.NET controls) that are placed in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones and used as part of Web Parts applications.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> coleção contém <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles e outros controles de servidor (como controles de usuário, controles personalizados e controles do ASP.NET) que são colocados em <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zonas e usados como parte de aplicativos Web Parts.

trans-unit.source: So, for example, if you have a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> zone in a page, and within it you declare a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control and the ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control, both controls will be in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> collection referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Assim, por exemplo, se você tiver um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> zonas em uma página, e nele você declarar um personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controle e o ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> controle, ambos os controles estará no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> coleção referenciada pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object exists so that the Web Parts control set can work with strongly typed collections.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> objeto existe para que o conjunto de controles de Web Parts pode trabalhar com coleções fortemente tipadas.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if you want to perform mass operations on a set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, you can get a reference to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, se você deseja executar operações em massa em um conjunto de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles, você pode obter uma referência a um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> objeto usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to loop through all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls on a page and change their appearance in some way.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, talvez você queira repetir todos os <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles em uma página e alterar a aparência de alguma forma.

trans-unit.source: Even though the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object is read-only, you can make programmatic changes to the properties of the underlying controls referenced in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Embora o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> objeto é somente leitura, você pode fazer alterações programáticas para as propriedades dos controles subjacentes referenciado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> objeto em uma página de Web Parts.

trans-unit.source: This example has three parts:
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo tem três partes:

trans-unit.source: The code for the page in a partial class.
trans-unit.target: O código para a página em uma classe parcial.

trans-unit.source: The Web page that contains the controls.
trans-unit.target: A página da Web que contém os controles.

trans-unit.source: A description of how the example works in a browser.
trans-unit.target: Uma descrição de como o exemplo funciona em um navegador.

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example contains the code for the page in a partial class.
trans-unit.target: A primeira parte do exemplo de código contém o código para a página em uma classe parcial.

trans-unit.source: Note that the `Button1_Click` method creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object that consists of all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which includes all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls on the page.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o `Button1_Click` método cria um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> objeto que consiste em todos o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles referenciados no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade, que inclui todos os a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles na página.

trans-unit.source: The method iterates through all the controls, and toggles each control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A> property, which determines whether that control is normal or minimized.
trans-unit.target: O método percorre todos os controles e alterna cada controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A> propriedade, que determina se o controle é minimizado ou normal.

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is the Web page that contains the controls.
trans-unit.target: A segunda parte do exemplo de código é a página da Web que contém os controles.

trans-unit.source: Notice that the controls declared in `WebPartZone1` are standard ASP.NET server controls, but because they are wrapped as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controls at run time, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> class inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class, the controls are automatically treated as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls at run time and therefore are included in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Observe que os controles declarados em `WebPartZone1` são controles de servidor ASP.NET padrão, mas porque eles são encapsulados como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controles em tempo de execução e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> classe herda o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> classe, os controles são automaticamente tratado como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles em tempo de execução e, portanto, estão incluídos no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> objeto.

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser and click the **Toggle ChromeState** button, the code in the partial class loops through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object and alternately minimizes the controls or returns them to normal.
trans-unit.target: Depois de carregar a página em um navegador e clique no **alternância ChromeState** botão, o código na classe parcial percorre o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> do objeto e como alternativa minimiza os controles ou retorna ao normal.

trans-unit.source: Or, if you repeatedly click the **Toggle BulletedList1 Title** button, the title of the uppermost control is changed to alternate values.
trans-unit.target: Ou, se você clicar repetidamente o **alternância BulletedList1 título** botão, o título do controle superior é alterado para valores alternativos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an empty new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância vazia da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor initializes an empty instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.%23ctor%2A> construtor inicializa uma instância vazia do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> classe.

trans-unit.source: The object itself is read-only and has no method to add individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls to it; therefore, you will have little occasion to use this constructor.
trans-unit.target: O próprio objeto é somente leitura e não tem nenhum método para adicionar individuais <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles a ela; portanto, você terá pouco ocasião para usar este construtor.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> de controles <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection" /> object by passing in an <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection" /> passando uma coleção <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> de controles <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor initializes an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> class by passing in a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.%23ctor%2A> construtor inicializa uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> classe, passando uma coleção de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles.

trans-unit.source: Although a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object is read-only and there is no method for adding individual controls to it, you can create your own <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> collection of controls, and pass that to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Embora um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> objeto é somente leitura e não há nenhum método para adicionar controles individuais a ele, você pode criar seus próprios <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> coleção de controles e passá-lo para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: This enables you to create custom collections and perform bulk operations on them.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que você crie coleções personalizadas e executar operações em massa neles.

trans-unit.source: You can also access the underlying controls in the collection and change their property values programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode acessar os controles subjacentes na coleção e alterar seus valores de propriedade programaticamente.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.%23ctor%2A> construtor em uma página de Web Parts.

trans-unit.source: This example has three parts:
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo tem três partes:

trans-unit.source: The code for the page in a partial class.
trans-unit.target: O código para a página em uma classe parcial.

trans-unit.source: The Web page that contains the controls.
trans-unit.target: A página da Web que contém os controles.

trans-unit.source: A description of how the example works in a browser.
trans-unit.target: Uma descrição de como o exemplo funciona em um navegador.

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example contains the code for the page in a partial class.
trans-unit.target: A primeira parte do exemplo de código contém o código para a página em uma classe parcial.

trans-unit.source: Note that the `Button1_Click` method creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object that consists of all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which includes all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls on the page.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o `Button1_Click` método cria um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> objeto que consiste em todos o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles referenciados no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade, que inclui todos os a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles na página.

trans-unit.source: The method iterates through all the controls, and toggles each control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A> property, which determines whether that control is normal or minimized.
trans-unit.target: O método percorre todos os controles e alterna cada controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A> propriedade, que determina se o controle é minimizado ou normal.

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is the Web page that contains the controls.
trans-unit.target: A segunda parte do exemplo de código é a página da Web que contém os controles.

trans-unit.source: Notice that the controls declared in `WebPartZone1` are standard ASP.NET server controls, but because they are wrapped as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controls at run time, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> class inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class, the controls are automatically treated as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls at run time and therefore are included in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Observe que os controles declarados em `WebPartZone1` são controles de servidor ASP.NET padrão, mas porque eles são encapsulados como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controles em tempo de execução e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> classe herda o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> classe, os controles são automaticamente tratado como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles em tempo de execução e, portanto, estão incluídos no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> objeto.

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, click the **Toggle ChromeState** button, and notice that the code in the partial class loops through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object and alternately minimizes the controls or returns them to normal.
trans-unit.target: Depois de carregar a página em um navegador, clique no **alternância ChromeState** botão e, em seguida, observe que o código na classe parcial percorre o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> do objeto e como alternativa minimiza os controles ou retorna ao normal.

trans-unit.source: Or, if you repeatedly click the **Toggle BulletedList1 Title** button, the title of the uppermost control is changed to alternate values.
trans-unit.target: Ou, se você clicar repetidamente o **alternância BulletedList1 título** botão, o título do controle superior é alterado para valores alternativos.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="webParts" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="webParts" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: An object in the <paramref name="webParts" /> collection is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto na coleção <paramref name="webParts" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- ou -

trans-unit.source: An object in the <paramref name="webParts" /> collection is not a of type <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto na coleção <paramref name="webParts" /> não é do tipo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that is checked to determine whether it is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> que é verificado para determinar se ele está na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether a particular control exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se um determinado controle existe na coleção.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether a particular control is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booliano que indica se um determinado controle está na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.Contains%2A> method enables you to check a particular <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> object and determine whether it is part of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.Contains%2A> método permite que você verifique se um determinado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> do objeto e determinar se ele é parte de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> objeto.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> objects to contain the copied collection.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de objetos de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> para conter a coleção copiada.

trans-unit.source: The starting point in the array at which to place the collection contents.
trans-unit.target: O ponto inicial na matriz na qual o conteúdo da coleção será colocado.

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection to an array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Copia a coleção para uma matriz de objetos <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.CopyTo%2A> method is useful when you want to assemble a custom array that can contain the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object, a subset of those controls, or a superset of those controls.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.CopyTo%2A> método é útil quando você deseja montar uma matriz personalizada que contém o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> objeto, um subconjunto desses controles ou um subconjunto desses controles.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> que é um membro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of a particular member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a posição de um membro específico da coleção.

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the position of a particular object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que indica a posição de um objeto específico na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.IndexOf%2A> method is useful if you have multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls on a Web Parts page, and you need to know the ordinal position of one control relative to the others.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.IndexOf%2A> método será útil se você tiver vários <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles em uma página de Web Parts e você precisam saber a posição ordinal de um controle em relação a outras pessoas.

trans-unit.source: Returns a specific member of the collection according to its position or a unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um membro específico da coleção de acordo com sua posição ou com um identificador exclusivo.

trans-unit.source: The index of a particular <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control in a collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice de um determinado controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> em uma coleção.

trans-unit.source: Returns a member of the collection based on its position in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um membro da coleção com base em sua posição na coleção.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> no índice especificado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.Item%2A> indexer allows you to access the underlying <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object by index, and change their property values or call methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.Item%2A> indexador permite que você acesse subjacente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> por índice, do objeto e alterar seus valores de propriedade ou chamar métodos.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.Item%2A> indexer on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.Item%2A> indexador em uma página de Web Parts.

trans-unit.source: This example has three parts:
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo tem três partes:

trans-unit.source: The code for the page in a partial class.
trans-unit.target: O código para a página em uma classe parcial.

trans-unit.source: The Web page that contains the controls.
trans-unit.target: A página da Web que contém os controles.

trans-unit.source: A description of how the example works in a browser.
trans-unit.target: Uma descrição de como o exemplo funciona em um navegador.

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example contains the code for the page in a partial class.
trans-unit.target: A primeira parte do exemplo de código contém o código para a página em uma classe parcial.

trans-unit.source: Note that the `Button2_Click` method creates an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object, then assigns to it the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls from the `WebPartZone1.WebParts` property.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o `Button2_Click` método cria um vazio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> objeto e, em seguida, atribui a ele o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controla do `WebPartZone1.WebParts` propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The method accesses the first control in the collection by using its index, and toggles its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Title%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: O método acessa o primeiro controle na coleção usando seu índice e alterna o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Title%2A> o valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is the Web page that contains the controls.
trans-unit.target: A segunda parte do exemplo de código é a página da Web que contém os controles.

trans-unit.source: Notice that the controls declared in `WebPartZone1` are standard ASP.NET server controls, but because they are wrapped as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controls at run time, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> class inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class, the controls can be treated as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls at run time and made part of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Observe que os controles declarados em `WebPartZone1` são controles de servidor ASP.NET padrão, mas porque eles são encapsulados como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controles em tempo de execução e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> classe herda o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> classe, os controles podem ser tratados como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles em tempo de execução e fez parte de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> objeto.

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, click the **Toggle BulletedList1 Title** button, and notice that the code toggles the title of the control between the two available title choices.
trans-unit.target: Depois de carregar a página em um navegador, clique o **alternância BulletedList1 título** botão e observe que o código alterna o título do controle entre as duas opções de título disponível.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for a particular <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control in a collection.
trans-unit.target: O identificador exclusivo para um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> específico em uma coleção.

trans-unit.source: Returns a member of the collection based on a unique string identifier.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um membro da coleção com base em um identificador de cadeia de caracteres exclusivo.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> in the collection whose ID equals the value of <paramref name="id" />.
trans-unit.target: A primeira <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> na coleção cuja ID igual ao valor de <paramref name="id" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.Item%2A> indexer enables you to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object according to a unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.Item%2A> indexador permite que você acesse um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controlar uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> objeto de acordo com um identificador exclusivo.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set performs case-insensitive matching on this property, so case sensitivity is not part of a unique `id` value.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de controles de Web Parts executa a correspondência diferencia maiusculas de minúsculas nessa propriedade para diferenciação de maiusculas e minúsculas não seja parte de uma única `id` valor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.Item%2A> property also works to identify members of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object in some specialized cases.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection.Item%2A> propriedade também funciona para identificar membros de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> objeto em alguns casos especializados.

trans-unit.source: In the case of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controls, the indexer is able to match the identifier for the underlying child control wrapped by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: No caso de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controles, o indexador é capaz de corresponder ao identificador para o controle filho subjacente encapsulado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controle.

trans-unit.source: In the case of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> controls, the indexer matches the identifier for the control based on a case-insensitive comparison of the `id` parameter and either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.OriginalID%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.GenericWebPartID%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: No caso de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> controles, o indexador coincidir com o identificador para o controle com base em uma comparação entre maiusculas e minúsculas de `id` parâmetro e uma a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.OriginalID%2A> ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.GenericWebPartID%2A> valores de propriedade.
